alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:05PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Custer, Oglala Lakota, northeastern Fall River, southwestern Bennett and southeastern Pennington Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 505 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Fairburn to 5 miles southwest of Intersection of Red Shirt and Cuny Table Roads to 3 miles northwest of Slim Buttes Housing. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oglala, South Lakeside, Loneman, Intersection of Red Shirt and Cuny Table Roads and Slim Buttes Housing around 510 PM MDT. Number 4 around 515 PM MDT. Calico, Folsom and Red Shirt around 520 PM MDT. Pine Ridge around 525 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wolf Creek Housing, Wounded Knee, Lonesome Valley, Rockyford, Goose Neck Housing, Porcupine, Scenic, Thunder Valley, Porcupine Butte Housing, Sharps Corner, Sheep Mountain Table, Batesland and Wakpamni. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains
